items.summary: Make the portfolio’s overall background more colorful while keeping it professional and readable (e.g., add subtle multi-color gradients/aurora effects behind the page and/or alternating sections) and ensure the new background styling is applied consistently across the single-page layout.

Enhance “decorated text” styling across the portfolio by adding tasteful typographic accents (e.g., gradient headings, highlighted keywords/labels, subtle text outlines/shadows where appropriate) while keeping the design cohesive with the existing palette and ensuring it works with reduced-motion/accessibility preferences.

Provide the exact in-repo file path where the user should place/replace their profile photo so it appears in the Hero section, and make this path discoverable in the codebase (e.g., via a clearly named constant and/or an inline comment near the Hero image). The currently used profile image path must be surfaced exactly as used by the app.
